entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
